product_name: Womo Designs Chassis with GoPro Handlebar Mount
long_description: Designed to free up your handlebar space, the Womo Designs Chassis with GoPro Handlebar Mount allows the attachment of your GoPro camera (not included) and an additional accessory. Womo Designs Chassis with GoPro Handlebar Mount is machined from aircraft grade aluminum giving the mount the rigidity required to function at the highest possible level. Womo Designs Chassis with GoPro Handlebar Mount accepts 2 accessory kits (sold separately). Compatible with 31.8mm diameter handlebars; anodized and laser etched.
short_description: Designed to free up your handlebar space, the Womo Designs Chassis with GoPro Handlebar Mount allows the attachment of your GoPro camera (not included) and an additional accessory.
